tips: Projects are your applications made up from images available in Registries.
noItems: You haven't created a project yet. Make one by clicking 'Add' on the top right.
name: Name
proceedYouLoseAllDataToName: If you proceed, you will lose all your data related to {{name}}, all configurations, all verison history, all deployments. This action is not revocable.
setNameAsDefault: If you set {{name}} as the default version, all newly created versions will contain the same images and deployments by default.
